title: Marvel Now - Week 10/02/2013
description:
Hello everybody, here we are with the first Marvel NOW! comic pack of the month!
The most relevant comics of this week are:

- All new X-men Special, first of a 3-part miniseries, and Captain America: Living Legend, another mini-series in four issues, drawed by the amazing Adi Granov.

- All new X-men 17, the 6th chapter of the Mutant Evenet: "Battle of the Atom"

- Mighty Avengers 2 and Thunderbolts 16, both tie-ins of Infinity

And, with the others Marvel NOW! titles, I added the third part of Hunger, just like I've done in the previous packs.

In the end, I want to remember that this week went out "Marvel Knights: Spider-Man" and "Avengers - Endless Wartime", that i didn't add in this pack because, technically, they aren't "Marvel NOW!" comics, but I think they would be pretty cool and you can find them easily here on TPB.

For this week is all, see ya next time!
